snippet.title: Mirthwood - Official Announcement Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the announcement teaser for Mirthwood to learn more about the story and world of this upcoming RPG life sim game. Mirthwood is coming to PC.

Fleeing a continent swept with war, your arrival in a new land provides a fresh start. Experience an immersive medieval fantasy world that allows you to choose who you want to be.

#IGN #Gaming
